name: water-sport
effect: fire moves inflict half damage, regardless of target. If the user leaves the field, this effect ends.

flavor_text.black_white: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The user soaks itself with water. The move weakens Fire-type moves while the user is in the battle.
